item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, March 31, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘I still have nightmares’: the tourists shackled and jailed for weeks at US borders
2. Norway urged to drop ‘crazy’ ban on investment in defence companies
3. Hegseth says US is setting up a ‘war-fighting’ base in Japan
4. [Opinion] The deep eccentricity of Donald Trump
5. Top US law firms balk at backing Perkins’ challenge to Trump sanctions
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, March 31, 2025 at 1:20 AM UTC
